title: Large Knife and Handle
description:
Large bronze knife and handle, all in one piece. Two vertical lines run down center of each side. The piece is otherwise undecorated.
Condition, edges considerably chipped, surface corroded and covered by light greenish deposit.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society
